Package simulator

Class Simulator

java.lang.Object
simulator.Simulator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Orchestrator
public class Simulator extends Object implements Orchestrator
Simulator simulates situations between nodes with actions performed between the nodes. Simulator also can create new instances for the nodes. Simulator can simulate in two ways: churn-based, time-based.

  • Constructor Details

    • Simulator

      public Simulator(Factory factory, NetworkProtocol networkType)
      Initializes a new simulation.
      Parameters:
      factory - factory object to create nodes based on inventory.
      networkType - the type of simulated communication protocol(**tcp**, **javarmi**, **udp**, and **mockNetwork*)

      Starts the simulator and spawns the identified number of nodes.

    • constantSimulation

      public void constantSimulation(int duration)
      Used to start the simulation. It calls the onStart method for all nodes to start the simulation.
      Parameters:
      duration - duration of the simulation

    • getAddress

      public String getAddress(Identifier nodeId)

    • churnSimulation

      public void churnSimulation(long lifeTime, ChurnGenerator interArrivalGen, ChurnGenerator sessionLengthGenerator)
      Simulate churn based on inter-arrival time and session length.
      Parameters:
      lifeTime - duration of the simulation.
      interArrivalGen - inter-arrival generator, i.e., time between two consecutive arrivals in the system.
      sessionLengthGenerator - session length generator, i.e., online duration of a node in the system.

    • getAllId

      public ArrayList<Identifier> getAllId()
      get all nodes identifier.
      Returns:
      nodes' identifier.
